cron.command: python manage.py runjobs hourly |& systemd-cat -t actions-registry
python manage.py runjobs daily |& systemd-cat -t actions-registry
python manage.py runjobs weekly |& systemd-cat -t actions-registry
python manage.py runjobs monthly |& systemd-cat -t actions-registry
python manage.py runjobs yearly |& systemd-cat -t actions-registry
